item.title: Information Theory in LLM Theory
item.description: ⚠️ 📥 😚 🛡 🚦 👹 🌿 By reading this blogpost, you will find out, why this emoji sequence is here. Introduction Background A Brief Introduction on Information Theory In this section we want to provide a brief overview on Information Theory. Imagine you lived $40\cdot n$ years in the future and that the population has doubled every $40$ years. For simplicity assume that in the current present just one person is alive.
